items.title: I want to love Apple’s new iPhone Air, but the iPhone 17 is a better deal
items.description: I was within a heartbeat of preordering the new iPhone Air. But a closer looks at the specs changed my mind.

items.title: Apple’s creator-centric iPhone 17 Pro will make the vlogging camera obsolete
items.description: Apple unveiled its new line of iPhones on Tuesday, and the iPhone 17 Pro is making a direct appeal to content creators.

items.title: The iPhone Air is a hint at the iPhone’s future, which could include foldables
items.description: The iPhone Air may not be ready to be your daily driver, but it's a hint of what's to come.

items.title: Microsoft to lessen reliance on OpenAI by buying AI from rival Anthropic
items.description: The move to diversify its AI partnerships by tapping the shoulder of OpenAI’s top rival comes as the AI company also pursues independence from Microso...

items.title: Apple unveils Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3
